title.rendered: Dialysis Equipment Market is Projected to Exceed US$ 29.93 Billion by 2033, Propelled by Increasing Demand for Advanced Dialysis Solutions

content.rendered:
Increasing investments in R&D activities to release dialysis equipment that facilitate optimal treatment for all age groups will likely augment the sales of dialysis devices in the global market.

/EIN News/ — NEWARK, Del, April 14, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — From 2023 to 2033, sales of dialysis equipment are anticipated to increase at a CAGR of 4.8%. According to FMI, the size of the global Dialysis Equipment Market could exceed US$ 18.73 billion in 2023 and reach US$ 29.93 billion by 2033.

End-stage renal diseases (ESRD) are quite common in the elderly population, and many people in this age range need monthly dialysis therapy. Nowadays, kidney disease is acknowledged as an endemic issue that affects more than 850 million people worldwide. 

Acute kidney damage risk is increased by the prevalence of chronic conditions like diabetes and hypertension. One of the main causes of the rising prevalence of renal disorders worldwide is a sedentary lifestyle. 

Injuries and disorders that produce sepsis or systemic inflammatory response syndrome are causative factors. Both intermittent hemodialysis (IHD) and continuous renal replacement therapy (CRRT) are options for patients with acute kidney damage. Acute kidney damage dialysis treatments are generally used to remove extra water and waste.

Find a comprehensive report summary that describes the market size and forecast along with the research methodology. The Sample report is available in PDF format@ https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/reports/sample/rep-gb-711

Miniaturization and advances in nanotechnology enable the quick development of portable medical equipment, such as wearable dialysis units. Many portable dialysis devices, for instance, are now undergoing clinical testing in the United States and are expected to become commercially available in the upcoming years.

Several improvements to peritoneal dialysis (PD) have been achieved throughout time. Advancements have been made in enriching fluid quality in PD. These advancements have contributed to enhancing fluid quality, increasing the reliability of catheters and connections, and improving understanding of the peritoneal membrane in PD.

Leading industry participants are always attempting to create a mobile dialysis unit that is simple to operate at home. Portable dialysis units are mainly intended for home use and given their widespread availability and use. They could help to lessen the burden of end-stage renal diseases worldwide. 

The widespread adoption of innovative technologies in the renal dialysis sector is one of the elements boosting North America’s dominance in the dialysis equipment market. Also, there is a surge in public healthcare spending and huge awareness campaigns regarding the accessibility of cutting-edge therapies.

Increases in the number of diabetes patients across the region and the prevalence of chronic renal disease all helped to fuel market expansion.

Key Takeaways

  • From 2023 to 2033, the dialysis equipment market in the United States is projected to expand at a 3.6% CAGR.
  • By 2033, the dialysis equipment market in the United Kingdom is estimated to reach US$ 1.89 billion, expanding at a CAGR of 3.3%.
  • China is predicted to grow substantially in the dialysis equipment market, registering a CAGR of 6.6% during the forecast period.

Have a Conversation with the Analyst@ https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/ask-question/rep-gb-711

Competitive Landscape:

Market players in the dialysis equipment market are working hard to develop and deploy cutting-edge technologies to improve the effectiveness and security of the process. This covers the creation of wearable and portable dialysis equipment, automated and integrated dialysis machines, and enhanced filtration technologies.

To optimize the dialysis procedure and enhance patient care, market players are also concentrating on enhancing patient comfort and the usability of dialysis equipment. They are also actively pursuing many strategies, including partnerships, mergers, and collaborations. 

Key Players Working in the Dialysis Equipment Industry

  • Baxter
  • Asahi Kasei Corporation
  • Fresenius Medical Care AG & Co. KGaA
  • Cantel Medical
  • Rockwell Medical
  • JMS Co.Ltd.
  • Teleflex Incorporated
  • B. Braun Melsungen AG
  • NIPRO
  • HEMOCLEAN CO., LTD.
  • Quanta
  • Outset Medical, Inc.

Recent Developments:

  • In November 2019, Fresenius Medical Care unveiled the 4008A dialysis machine, embracing the company’s strong therapeutic standards while reducing costs for healthcare organizations.
  • Baxter International Inc. reported in January 2019 that its Sharesource remote patient management platform has conducted more than 5 million home PD treatments globally, which is anticipated to accelerate market expansion soon.

Psychosis Diagnostics Market Growth – The global psychosis diagnostics market garnered a market value of US$ 2.04 Billion in 2022 and is expected to accumulate a market value of US$ 3.6 Billion by registering a CAGR of 5.3% in the forecast period 2023 to 2033. 

Neurotrophic Keratopathy Treatment Market Trends – The global respiratory distress syndrome management market is slated to reach a valuation of US$ 5 billion in 2023. According to Future Market Insights, the market is expected to grow at a 7.17% CAGR until 2033, valued at US$ 10 billion.

Non-Sterile Liquids/Suspensions Market Forecast – The global non-sterile liquids/suspensions market held a valuation of US$ 2.6 Billion in 2022, and it is further projected to expand at a CAGR of 6.5% over the forecasted years.
